metadata.name: Azesco 300 mg Injection powder for solution

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For nutritional supplementation and for treating dietary shortage or imbalance

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: The two major forms of vitamin B6 are pyridoxine and pyridoxamine In the liver they are converted to pyridoxal phosphate PLP which is a cofactor in many reactions of amino acid metabolism PLP also is necessary for the enzymatic reaction governing the release of glucose from glycogen Pyroluria is one potential cause of vitamin B6 deficiency
